advisories.description: An XSS vulnerability in the auto-complete function of the description field (for new or edited transactions) in Firefly III allows the user to execute JavaScript via suggested transaction titles. NOTE: this is exploitable only in a non-default configuration where Content Security Policy headers are disabled.
advisories.title: Cross-site Scripting
